short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Google Docs, Sheets and Slides docs in separated and dedicated window automatically, without an address bar or browser buttons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically opens your different documents from the Google Document suite in a dedicated window, as if you were using dedicated software. You have more space to work because the other browser components don't appear. It also gives you direct access to your various documents being edited in the taskbar of your operating system.
